cab.content: 02oMilitary Secret. 1045From Secretary of State for India, to Viceroy, Army Department,Uth August 1919.3084. Your telegram of 2nd August, 10464.I agree that Malleson's proposal to send a letter to the Bolsheviks cannot be agreed to.T see, however, no objection to Malleson moving troops up to Transcaspian frontier with the object of inducing a Bolshevik retirement, provided no commitment, written or oral, is made to the Transcaspians or Turkomans.
